threeGenerations.title: 50 Years of Trust, Three Generations of Love
threeGenerations.description: For five decades, the Goyal family has been weaving love stories across India. What began as a traditional matchmaking service has evolved into a pioneering AI-powered platform, but our core values remain unchanged: authentic connections, family harmony, and lasting relationships built on deep compatibility.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.content: It was 1974 when Dadu, Chaman Prakash Goyal, first realized his calling. A young man in his village couldn't find a suitable match despite being from a good family. Dadu spent weeks traveling from village to village, meeting families, understanding their values, and finally found the perfect match. The wedding was celebrated for days, and both families blessed Dadu for bringing such joy into their lives. That day, he knew his purpose: to unite hearts that were meant to be together.
ourStory.philosophy: "A good marriage isn't about finding the perfect person, but about becoming the perfect match for each other." - Chaman Prakash Goyal
